doc:
Hillary Brooke https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hillary_Brooke 0 Hillary Brooke (born Beatrice Sofia Mathilda Peterson, September 8, 1914 – May 25, 1999) was an American film actress. Though American-born, she began cultivating a sophisticated English accent to get more film parts early in her career. It eventually became second nature to her, and she was cast as a British woman in most of her films, including one that was produced in the United Kingdom. Hillary_Brooke ( born Beatrice_Sofia_Mathilda_Peterson , September_8_,_1914 – May_25_,_1999 ) was an_American_film_actress . Though American-born , she began_cultivating a_sophisticated_English_accent to_get more_film_parts early in her_career . It eventually became second_nature to her , and she was_cast as a_British_woman in most of her_films , including one that was_produced in the_United_Kingdom .
